macros.sourceContext:
|
  • The {{domxref("ServiceWorkerContainer.register()")}} and {{domxref("WorkerGlobalScope.importScripts()")}} (when used by a service worker) methods will now accept any files with a valid JavaScript MIME type (Firefox bug 1354577).
    • |
  • The {{domxref("FetchEvent.replacesClientId")}} and {{domxref("FetchEvent.resultingClientId")}} properties are now supported (Firefox bug 1264177).
    • > |
  • The {{domxref("ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.messageerror_event", "ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.onmessageerror")}} and {{domxref("ServiceWorkerContainer.onmessageerror")}} handler properties have been implemented (Firefox bug 1399446).
    • ^ |
  • The {{httpheader("Origin")}} header is no longer set on Fetch requests with a method of {{HTTPMethod("HEAD")}} or {{HTTPMethod("GET")}} (Firefox bug 1508661).
    • |

title: Firefox 65 for developers
summary: This article provides information about the changes in Firefox 65 that will affect developers. Firefox 65 was released on January 29, 2019.
